title: Now his yellow jersey to lose: Jonas Vingegaard tightens grip on Tour de France after quadrupling lead
content:
Jumbo-Visma says that GC fight is now 'over' as long as Vingegaard stays out of trouble.

Read the full article at Now his yellow jersey to lose: Jonas Vingegaard tightens grip on Tour de France after quadrupling lead on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
